headerDisplay: To authenticate with MELCloud, click the **Settings** (⚙️) button above and follow the OAuth flow. After authentication, your settings will appear here.

refreshToken.title: Refresh Token
refreshToken.description: Automatically set via OAuth. Do NOT edit manually!

refreshInterval.title: Device Status Refresh Interval (seconds)
refreshInterval.description: How often to poll MELCloud API for device status updates. Default is 30 seconds for responsive updates. Increase if you want fewer API calls. Note: Changes made via HomeKit update instantly (within 2 seconds).

exposeTemperatureSensor.title: Expose Temperature Sensor
exposeTemperatureSensor.description: Expose a separate temperature sensor for each AC unit. This allows HomeKit automations to trigger based on temperature (HomeKit doesn't allow automations from the built-in temperature on HeaterCooler accessories). You can hide the extra sensor tile in the Home app if desired.
